name: Dialz Watch
details: Dialz MERN Stack website build with React.js along with CRUD and Dashboard functionalities. Google Firebase has been used for user authentication and hosting. For database i have use MongoDB here. Node.js is used in backend.
technology: Nodejs JavaScript Mongodb Reactjs Firebase-auth React-Hook Bootstrap5 Heroku Expressjs

name: Naimul Sport Academy
details: A hotel booking website based on the place you want to visit. The system will recommend available hotels near your travel destination for booking.
